environment.notes: long day; manual terminal entry from phone prompts

questions_and_answers.question: What is the current objective?
questions_and_answers.answer: Get both swarm nodes boot-stable with matching CPUs, install two coolers, and stand up an offline-first learning/LLM toolchain.

questions_and_answers.question: What constraints are active?
questions_and_answers.answer: Weak internet; manual copy/typing from phone; time/energy low; parts still in transit (PSU adapter, coolers).

questions_and_answers.question: What decisions are locked in?
questions_and_answers.answer: Stick with LGA1200 across both nodes; target i5-11400 pair (B560 plug-and-play, B460 after BIOS update); single PSU with dual-ATX adapter; offline-first scripts.

questions_and_answers.question: What changed your mind today?
questions_and_answers.answer: Channel flakiness and bandwidth pain → doubled down on aria2c/wget + Modelfile imports and protocolized checklists.

questions_and_answers.question: Any risks or blind spots identified?
questions_and_answers.answer: When tired, forthright tone can read as dismissive; risk of over-purchasing parts under stress; BIOS update sequencing on B460 is critical.

questions_and_answers.question: What will you verify next session?
questions_and_answers.answer: 8-pin CPU power seated, GPU PCIe power present, RAM in recommended slots; BIOS version on B460; cooler clearances; download folders/permissions.

decisions.title: CPU Family Match
decisions.detail: Buy second i5-11400; update B460 BIOS to support 11th Gen.

decisions.title: Power Topology
decisions.detail: One 850W Gold PSU + dual-ATX adapter; both boards power together.

decisions.title: Offline Downloads
decisions.detail: Use aria2c/curl with HF token and yt-dlp with archives; avoid flaky /videos tabs.

decisions.title: Protocol Use
decisions.detail: Status Declaration before instructions; tiered steps; stop/fallback rules.

risks_and_mitigations.risk: BIOS too old for 11th Gen on B460
risks_and_mitigations.mitigation: Update BIOS with 10th-Gen CPU before swapping; follow vendor guide.
Use aria2c/curl with resume; import via Modelfile to avoid re-pulls.
Pause; run Status Sync; recheck after sleep before major purchases.

next_actions_24h: Purchase: i5-11400 (second unit) + two LGA1200 coolers + dual-ATX adapter.
Hardware: seat 8-pin CPU power; verify RAM slots; connect GPU 8-pin.
B460: identify BIOS rev; plan update path.
Software: commit scripts (hf_get.sh, yt_bulk.sh); add Channels.md; push Protocol Cards.
